title: 'Shot Dead Near Toronto University': Indian Student Killed in Canada; Suspect on the Run
excerpt: An Indian student was tragically shot dead near Toronto University, Canada. Authorities are currently searching for the suspect who remains at large. This incident raises serious concerns about student safety in the area.
metaDescription: Indian student shot dead near Toronto University, Canada. Suspect on the run as police investigate the tragic incident impacting community safety.
author: WebKoya Team

title: Bangladesh Leader Considered PM Frontrunner Returns from Exile Ahead of Polls
excerpt: A major political development unfolds as a prominent Bangladesh leader, widely regarded as the prime ministerial frontrunner, returns from 17 years in exile. This return marks a pivotal moment ahead of the upcoming national elections.
metaDescription: Bangladesh’s leading political figure returns from 17 years in exile, positioning as prime minister frontrunner before national elections.
author: WebKoya Team

title: 11 Killed After Truck Collides With Sleeper Bus in Karnataka’s Chitradurga, Several Injured
excerpt: A tragic accident in Karnataka's Chitradurga district claimed 11 lives after a truck collided head-on with a sleeper bus, leaving several passengers injured. The incident has raised concerns about road safety and emergency response in the region.
metaDescription: 11 people died and several injured after a truck collided with a sleeper bus in Chitradurga, Karnataka. Learn about the accident details and safety measures.
author: WebKoya Team

title: Unnao Rape Survivor to Move Supreme Court Against Suspension of Sengar’s Jail Term
excerpt: The Unnao rape survivor is set to approach the Supreme Court challenging the suspension of Kuldeep Singh Sengar’s jail term. This move highlights ongoing demands for justice in a high-profile case that has drawn national attention.
metaDescription: Unnao rape survivor to petition Supreme Court against suspension of Kuldeep Singh Sengar’s jail term, seeking continued justice and accountability.
author: WebKoya Team
